thread.title: 27 Inexpensive Rugs That Look Fancy AF
thread.title_full: 27 Inexpensive Rugs That Look Fancy AF

author: Emma McAnaw
title: 27 Inexpensive Rugs That Look Fancy AF
text:
All rugs are 5’7” unless otherwise noted. ID: 10721479 1. A light blue and white combination for a clean, airy living room. View this image › 
amazon.com / Via amazon.com Get it from Amazon for $94.60 
ID: 10699431 2. A 70’s inspired patchwork rug that’s ready to rock your apartment. View this image › 
urbanoutfitters.com / Via urbanoutfitters.com Get it from Urban Outfitters for $99 .
ID: 10699209 3. A tapestry hand woven by artisans to support education for at-risk children in India. View this image › 
target.com / Via target.com Get it from Target for $69.99 
ID: 10700790 4. A turquoise rug for *jewel-toned* décor. How ornate. target.com / Via target.com Get it from Target for $84.99 
ID: 10699492 5. A Moroccan-inspired print that transforms your space into a relaxing escape. urbanoutfitters.com / Via urbanoutfitters.com , urbanoutfitter.som / Via urbanoutfitters.com Get it from Urban Outfitters for $89 
ID: 10700982 6. A vintage-esque rug that really commands the room. amazon.com / Via amazon.com Get it from Amazon for $91.23 
ID: 10699461 7. A bold, striped rug that instantly modernizes your home. burlingtoncoatfactory.com / Via burlingtoncoatfactory.com Get it from Burlington Coat Factory for $49.99 
ID: 10699942 8. A vibrant Turkish-inspired rug that transports your room to ~exotic~ places. amazon.com / Via amazon.com , amazon.com / Via amazon.com Get it from Amazon for $74.99 
ID: 10699210 9. A dotted geometric pattern that’s right on point. View this image › 
target.com / Via target.com Get it from Target for $84.99 
ID: 10700809 10. A sunny motif to shed a light on even the most cramped rooms. View this image › 
urbanoutfitters.com / Via urbanoutfitters.com Get it from Urban Outfitters for $99 
ID: 10699537 11. A textile to bring your room out to the Wild, Wild West. Yee-haw. View this image › 
target.com / Via target.com Get it from Target from $84.99 
ID: 10700746 12. An Impressionist-like carpet that could be placed in Versailles. $79.99 amazon.com / Via amazon.com Get it from Amazon for $79.99 
ID: 10699443 13. An rug that’s fit for a King (or Kween). wayfair.com / Via wayfair.com Get it from WayFair for $50.99 
ID: 10701087 14. A black and white carpet for your minimalist chic pad. amazon.com / Via amazon.com Get it from Amazon for $61.99 
ID: 10699368 15. A posh rug that I like to imagine Marie Antoinette would rest her pretty heels on. View this image › 
wayfair.com / Via wayfair.com Get it from WayFair for $48.62 
ID: 10701117 16. A print for the haute hippie. wayfair.com / Via wayfair.com Get it from WayFair for $48.70 
ID: 10701100 17. A zebra carpet that unleashes your place to the *wild* side. View this image › 
casa.com / Via casa.com Get it from Casa.com for $83.97 
ID: 10700114 18. An electric indigo rug for the eclectic stylist. amazon.com / Via amazon.com Get it from Amazon for $79.89 
ID: 10699513 19. A rug that adds style plus comfort to your life. Do the math. urbanoutfitters.com / Via urbanoutfitters.com Get it from Urban Outfitters for $89 
ID: 10716440 20. A soft, cotton mat to give your tired feet the cushy relief you so deserve. urbanoutfitters.com / Via urbanoutfitters.com Get it from Urban Outfitters for $99 
ID: 10700870 21. A mid-century rug that brings your home up to date. burlingtoncoatfactory.com / Via burlingtoncoatfactory.com Get it from Burlington Coat Factory for $49.99 
ID: 10699961 22. A lush layout that’s anything but a…floor…flower? View this image › 
target.com / Via target.com Get it from Target for $59.49 
ID: 10700730 23. A light yellow creates a serene space so you can feel at peace during your eleventh hour of Netflix. *Namaste.* View this image › 
target.com / Via target.com Get it from Target for $74.16 
ID: 10700760 24. A floral carpet for a blossoming boudoir. View this image › 
jet.com / Via jet.com Get it from Jet for $98 
ID: 10700332 25. A bohemian rug for the indie decorator. urbanoutfitters.com / Via urbanoutfitters.com Get it from Urban Outfitters for $99 
ID: 10701003 26. A plush carpet that makes a stately scene for your next soiree (you’re fancy now, you don’t just have parties). View this image › 
target.com / Via target.com Get it from Target for $59.49 
ID: 10700694 27. Orange you glad you have such sweet new digs? amazon.com / Via amazon.com Get it from Amazon for $94.87
